nodes.text: Hunt for Xesh and Daegen Lok

The Hunt for Xesh and Lok was started by the Je'daii Order when the fallen Je'daii Master Daegen Lok and the Force Hound Xesh escaped from Bogan where they were exiles. In addition of the group of Je'daii sent after the two Dark Side users, the Rakata Predor Skal'nas sent his own Force Hound after Xesh, Trill.
